5.4.20  10:47 am   so i'm canadian and i deeply resent the canadian nation-state and what it stands for, and think canadian nationalist identity erases the countless atrocities committed by european settlers against the indigenous peoples of turtle island. BUT i really love our national anthem, i think it's a beautiful song with countless gorgeous arrangements. is it morally okay to sing/perform/enjoy a song with ties to terrible events or ideologies?

Â Â Â Â Â yes

      i'm really struggling with this one man

Â Â Â Â Â  music is music. the person who wrote it might not have been canadian at all. music is a rare enough skill that it is often done on a for-hire basis. who knows, that song could have been written for a previous client who didn't end up taking it
